item.title: Outlining vs. Wingin' It
item.description: 36,000 words in. Progress is progressing. Some days it flows out of me like lightning from Palpatine’s fingers, sometimes it flows like granite embedded in diamond. Usually it’s somewhere in between. In this post, I’m going to write about something I have very little expertise in â€” which you can expect from most of my posts going forward. If only I wrote about things I’m an expert at, I’d write one post every decade.
